tools.name: Kage
tools.description: Graphical user interface for Metasploit Meterpreter and session handler

tools.name: Pupy
tools.description: Cross-platform, multi function remote access tool (RAT) and post-exploitation tool; fileless/all-in-memory execution, low footprint, multi-transport

tools.name: Redcloud
tools.description: Automated Red Team Infrastructure deployment using Docker

tools.name: Sliver
tools.description: Cross-platform implant framework that supports C2 over Mutual-TLS, HTTP(S), and DNS; remote access tool (RAT)

tools.name: Zphisher
tools.description: Automated phishing tool with multiple tunneling options; fork of Shellphish

tools.name: King Phisher
tools.description: A tool for testing and promoting user awareness by simulating real world phishing attacks

tools.name: Gophish
tools.description: Gophish is an open-source phishing toolkit designed for businesses and penetration testers. It provides the ability to quickly and easily setup and execute phishing engagements and security awareness training.
